FuncDef: This command configures location sources for the dynamic experience management. The location source types are, for example, 3G and congestion point.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the location or access technology. Values-access-point - Provides Dynamic Experience Management (DEM) for the WLGW access point..
Specifies which congestion point within the specified source-type to monitor for congestion. Values-MAC+VLAN - WLGW access point (MAC) and radio (VLAN)..
